heading: Nonets.
general-note: Here are entered collections of compositions for nine instruments belonging to various families and in various combinations. Collections of compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for a single combination of nine instruments, and individual works, are entered under this heading followed by a parenthetical qualifier with the names of the instruments or the term "unspecified instrument(s).".

Compositions for nine bowed stringed instruments are entered under. String nonets;. for nine wind instruments under. Wind nonets;. for nine brass instruments under. Brass nonets;. for nine woodwind instruments under. Woodwind nonets;. and for nine plucked stringed instruments under. Plucked instrument nonets..
Compositions for nine percussionists are entered under. Percussion ensembles..
Compositions for nine solo voices are entered under. Sacred vocal nonets. or. Vocal nonets..
